yaml.title: Publications
yaml.description-meta: Information, pdfs, and social metrics of papers

markdown.markdown:
{{< include /files/includes/_academic.qmd >}} My work has been published in the *Economic Journal*, *Journal of Public Economics*, *Journal of Health Economics*, *Journal of Population Economics*, *American Journal of Agricultural Economcis*, *Social Science & Medicine*, and *JAMA Network Open*. You can find my recent [CV](files/Wei-Fu-CV.pdf){.external target="_blank"} and [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=m8-eoB8AAAAJ&hl=en) here. ```{=html} ``` Notes: \* corresponding author; + first author; ++ co-first author; GS graduate student advisee.    **Local problems, local solutions: Evidence from the Drug-Free Communities program on Youth Development**
         Shijun You, Wei Fu, and Shin-Yi Chou. 2025.
         *Submitted*
         [[NBER Working Paper No. 34182](https://www.nber.org/papers/w34182)] **Capping the First Script: Initial Opioid Prescription Limits and Intimate Partner Violence**
         Wei Fu and Ashley C. Bradford. 2025
         *R&R at Journal of Health Economics*
**The Devastating Dance between Opioid and Housing Crises: Evidence from OxyContin Reformulation**
         Ashley C. Bradford, Wei Fu, and Shijun You. 2024
         *Journal of Health Economics*
         [[Published version](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0167629624000754)] **Unemployment Insurance and Cigarette Smoking**
         Wei Fu and Feng Liu. 2019
         *Journal of Health Economics* 63:34-51
         [[Published version](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-023-40337-3)] ### Health Care Utilization and Inequality **Abortion, Economic Hardship, and Crime**
         Erkmen G. Aslim, Wei Fu, Caitlin Myers, Erdal Tekin, and Bingjin Xue. 2025.
         *Submitted*,
         [[NBER Working Paper No. 30155](https://www.nber.org/papers/w30155)] **Proximity to Abortion Services and Child Maltreatment**
         Aslim Erkmen, Wei Fu, and Erdal Tekin. 2025.
         *Submitted*,
         [[NBER Working Paper No. w32771](https://www.nber.org/papers/w32771)] **NIH Grant Expansion, Ancestral Diversity and Scientific Discovery in Genomics Research**
         Wei Fu+, Shin-Yi Chou, and Li-San Wang. 2026.
         Accepted, *Journal of Population Economic*,
         [[NBER Working Paper No. 30155](https://www.nber.org/papers/w30155)] **From Syringes to Dishes: Improving Food Security through Vaccination**
         Erkmen G. Aslim, Wei Fu, Erdal Tekin, and Shijun You. 2025
         *Journal of Public Economics* 247:105392
         [[Published version](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0047272725000908?utm_campaign=STMJ_219742_AUTH_SERV_PA&utm_medium=email&utm_acid=194150690&SIS_ID=&dgcid=STMJ_219742_AUTH_SERV_PA&CMX_ID=&utm_in=DM567183&utm_source=AC_)] [[NBER WP 31025](https://www.nber.org/papers/w31045)] **State Vaccination Policies, Delayed Care, and Health Expenditures**
         Erkmen G. Aslim, Wei Fu, Chia-Lun Liu, and Erdal Tekin. 2024
         *Economic Journal* 134(664):3096-136
         [[Published version](https://academic.oup.com/ej/article/134/664/3096/7701410)] **A Single Dose For Me, A Wealth of Protection For Us: The Public Health Cost of Individualism in the Rollout of COVID-19 Vaccine**
         Wei Fu+, Li-San Wang, and Shin-Yi Chou. 2024
         *Social Science & Medicine* 348:116849.
         [[Published version](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0277953624002934)] **Reconcile the Debate Over Protective Effects of BCG Vaccine against COVID-19**
         Wei Fu++, Pei-Chuan Ho, Chia-Lun Liu, Kai-Teh Tzeng, Nawar Nayeem, Jonni S. Moore, Li-San Wang, and Shin-Yi Chou. 2021.
         *Scientific Reports* 11(1):8356
         [[Published version](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-021-87731-9)] ### Children and Female Wellbeing **Protecting Children through Paid Family Leave: Reduced Child Maltreatment in the Short- and Long-Run**
         Wei Fu and Muzhe Yang. 2025.
         *Working Paper*
**Homes in Limbo, Children at Risk: Exploring the Link between Housing Instability and Child Maltreatment Using the Discontinuity of the Protecting Tenants at Foreclosure Act**
         Wei Fu and Muzhe Yang. 2025.
         *Working Paper*
**The 2005 TennCare Disenrollments Increased Rates of Intimate Partner Violence: Insights for the Post-COVID Medicaid Unwinding**
         Wei Fu+, Melissa B. Eggen, and Qi Zheng. 2025.
         *Health Services Research* 20:e14647
         [[Published version](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/1475-6773.14647?msockid=33ac7d22ec1b6b8a0c046e77ed746ab0)] **Migration Control Policy and Parent-Child Separation among Migrant Families: Evidence from China**
         Yuanyuan Chen and Wei Fu. 2023.
         *Journal of Population Economics* 36(4):2347-2388
         [[Published version](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00148-023-00971-z)] **Unemployment Benefits, Food Insecurity, and Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program Spending**
         Wei Fu, Chen Huang and Feng Liu. 2023
         *American Journal of Agricultural Economics* 105(2):479-502
         [[Published version](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/ajae.12322)] **Mental Distress Among Female Individuals of Reproductive Age and Reported Barriers to Legal Abortion Following the US Supreme Court Decision to Overturn Roe v Wade**
         Dhaval Dave, Wei Fu, and Muzhe Yang. 2023.
         *JAMA Network Open* 6(3):e234509-e234509
         [[Published version](https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jamanetworkopen/fullarticle/2802750)] ### Cognitive Function in Later-Life **The Inclusion of ADRD Hierarchical Condition Category in Medicare Advantage Risk Adjustment Model is Associated with Improved Access to Healthcare**
         Wei Fu+, Yuting Qian, Seyed Karimi, Hamid Zarei, and Xi Chen. 2025.
         *R&R at JAMA Network Open*
**The Prediction of Alzheimer’s Disease through Multi-Trait Genetic Modeling**
         Kaylyn Clark, Wei Fu++, Chia-Lun Liu, Pei-Chuan Ho, Hui Wang, Wan-Ping Lee, Shin-Yi Chou, Li-San Wang, Jung-Ying Tzeng. 2023.
         *Frontiers in Aging Neuroscience* 15:1168638
         [[Published version](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fnagi.2023.1168638/full)] **Alzheimer’s Disease Variant Portal (ADVP): A Catalog of Genetic Findings for Alzheimer’s Disease**
         Pavel P. Kuksa, Chia-Lun Liu, Wei Fu++, Liming Qu, Yi Zhao, Zivadin Katanic, Amanda B Kuzma, Pei-Chuan Ho, Kai-Teh Tzeng, Otto Valladares, Shin-Yi Chou, Adam C Naj, Gerard D Schellenberg, Li-San Wang, and Yuk Yee Leung. 2022.
         *Journal of Alzheimer’s Disease* 86:461–477
         [[Published version](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.3233/JAD-215055))] ## Peer-Reviewed Chinese Journals \[Econ\] Yuanyuan Chen and **Wei Fu**. 2023. Migration Control Policy in Megalopolis, School Enrollment Requirement and Children Left-behind. (特大城市人口调控政策、入学门槛与儿童留守). China Economic Quarterly (经济学(季刊)). \[Econ\] Yuanyuan Chen and **Wei Fu**. 2017. Land Transfer Right, Rural-to-Urban Migration and Agricultural Production. (土地承包经营权流转、劳动力流动与农业生产). Management World (管理世界). \[Econ\] Feng Huang and **Wei Fu**. 2017. Purchased by Government or Provided by Family? Estimating the Substitution Effects of Informal Care. (政府购买还是家庭照料? 基于家庭照料替代效应的实证分析). Nankai Economic Studies (南开经济研究). \[Econ\] Zhaohua Li and **Wei Fu**. 2013. Ecological Footprint Analysis of the China’s International Trade. (中国进出口贸易内涵自然资本的生态足迹分析). China Industrial Economics (中国工业经济).
